typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		GREEN_M2 as string,
		SLANTING_ROOF_HEIGHT as string,
		OWNER as string,
		ID as string,
		MONUMENTAL as string,
		FUNCTION as string,
		NAME as string,
		BRIDGE_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		BOUWJAAR as string,
		HEAT_EFFECT as string,
		BRIDGE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		BRIDGE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		BRIDGE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		ROAD_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		ROAD_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		ROAD_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		ROAD_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		ROAD_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		PAVED_AREA_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		PAVED_AREA_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		PAVED_AREA_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		PAVED_AREA_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		PAVED_AREA_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		SOCIAL_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		SOCIAL_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		SOCIAL_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		SOCIAL_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		SOCIAL_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		SHOPPING_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		SHOPPING_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		SHOPPING_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		SHOPPING_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		SHOPPING_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		OTHER_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		OTHER_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		OTHER_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		OTHER_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		OTHER_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		NORMAL_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		NORMAL_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		NORMAL_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		NORMAL_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		NORMAL_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		OFFICES_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		OFFICES_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		OFFICES_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		OFFICES_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		OFFICES_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		LUXE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		LUXE_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		LUXE_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		LUXE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		LUXE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		INDUSTRY_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		INDUSTRY_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		INDUSTRY_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		INDUSTRY_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		INDUSTRY_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		EDUCATION_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		EDUCATION_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		EDUCATION_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		EDUCATION_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		EDUCATION_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		LEISURE_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		LEISURE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		LEISURE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		LEISURE_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		LEISURE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		HEALTHCARE_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		HEALTHCARE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		HEALTHCARE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		HEALTHCARE_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		HEALTHCARE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		NATURE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		NATURE_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		NATURE_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string,
		NATURE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		NATURE_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		GARDEN_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_YEAR as string,
		GARDEN_HEAT_FLOW_M2_CHANGE_PER_YEAR as string,
		GARDEN_HEAT_FLOW_M2_START_VALUE as string,
		GARDEN_HEAT_POWER_TO_FLOW_MULTIPLIER as string,
		GARDEN_SELL_PRICE_M2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	singleDocument: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> sourceBuildings
source(output(
		Building_sqnr as integer,
		Building_ID as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubBuildings
source(output(
		Category_ID as integer,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Category
source(output(
		Category_sqnr as integer,
		Category_ID as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBCategory
sourceBuildings, HubBuildings join(toInteger(ID) == Building_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSourceHubBuildings
JoinSourceHubBuildings select(mapColumn(
		Building_sqnr,
		Owner = OWNER,
		Name = NAME,
		Function_ = FUNCTION,
		Construction_year = BOUWJAAR,
		Slanting_roof_height = SLANTING_ROOF_HEIGHT,
		Heat_effect = HEAT_EFFECT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSourceHubBuildings
Category, HUBCategory lookup(Category@Category_ID == HUBCategory@Category_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCategory
SelectSourceHubBuildings sink(input(
		Building_sqnr as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		End_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string,
		Name as string,
		Owner as string,
		Function_ as string,
		Construction_year as integer,
		Slanting_roof_height as double,
		Heat_effect as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SATBuildings
LookupCategory sink(input(
		Category_sqnr as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		End_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SATCategory
